name: Fieldguide
long_description: ‍Fieldguide is an automation and collaboration platform for modern assurance and advisory firms that digitizes the end-to-end engagement workflow on a single platform. Built by former Big Four practitioners and experienced technology leaders, Fieldguide is trusted by top CPA firms to improve margins, win new business, and build stronger client relationships. Fieldguide is backed by top investors such as Bessemer Venture Partners (Sameer Dholakia), 8VC (Alex Moore), Y Combinator, Elad Gil, Floodgate, AICPA/CPA.com, Justin Kan (Twitch/justin.tv), Eric Ries (The Lean Startup), and more.
one_liner: Vertical AI for Audit & Advisory Firms
